title: So you want to own a pony
creator_credit: Robert Talbot and Associates, Dept of Home Affairs and Shell Company of Australia
brief_description: Owning one’s first pony is great fun but there can be pitfalls for the unwary. The Pony Club’s role in helping newcomers is well explained. A film for beginners and parents regarding the responsibilities of caring for a horse and the basics of riding.
